content: WHAT CRASH? Â WHAT CORRECTION??!? WHAT BEAR MARKET??   Now for something completely new! Â A custom ballet Cypher Hodl card with part of my companys copyrighted logo!Â Â  Please read here>>>> Â https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5465613.msg62793953#msg62793953Â I have only made 50 of each and will raffle one each week until I run out! Winner can pick one of the two as he or she choosesFace value says its 0.0005BTCâ€¦..which was an error at my end as I wanted to really have 0.00005 BTC.Â I will load all these cards with 0.00005 BTCâ€¦I will leave the rest for you to load to match the face valueÂ Â The sunrise card were loaded with $1 in BTC at the time of loading.Â Â Winner is allowed to pick only one of their choice!Â Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  KEEP ON HODLING FELLAS!!! Â  Â Â Free shipping in the USA, if overseas I can ship to MinerJones and you pay him for handling and reshippingOnly one spot per person.No NEWBIES registered anytime after 1st of JULYONLY ONE RULE>> PICK A Â NUMBER NO RANDOMS PLEASE..sorry randoms will be ignoredÂ Â Â  I also suggest using Â privnote.com to send me your addy via PM once raffle winner wants to get in touch with me.Its for your privacy. Â  Â You have to reach out to me when winning. If items are stolen or does not arrive because of thievery in the postal system I am not sending a new one.Read all of this and then decide if you want in or not. I am not responsible for any failed deliveries.Â I am sending out of the goodness of my heart and that's it. Â  This applied to all auctions in the past and future ones as well as the thread says. Goodluck!DO NOT SEND ME A PM WITH PRIV NOTE... UNLESS YOU WIN THE RAFFLE.If you win yes...if not no! And please send within 24hrs so I can keep track on who won what. Thanks Â  PLEASE PLACE YOUR INFO AS FOLLOWS WHEN PLACING YOUR LETTER OR NUMBERC KROGOTHMANHATTANIt makes my life easier to copy and pasteAnd it keeps me in a good mood too! Just a reminder for everyone past, present and future....Â Â  a) I do this for fun.
